metadata.title: CVE-2024-36032 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Bluetooth: qca: fix info leak when fetching fw build id Add the missingsanity checks and move the 255-byte build-id buffer off the stack to avoidleaking stack data through debugfs in case the build-info reply ismalformed.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
